title: Pound falls against dollar, euro after UK lawmakers reject Brexit timetable
text:
Pound falls against dollar, euro after UK lawmakers reject Brexit timetable

Forex 1 hour ago (Oct 23, 2019 02:48)

© Reuters. Pound falls against dollar, euro after UK lawmakers reject Brexit timetable NEW YORK, Oct 22 (Reuters) - The British pound fell against

the dollar and the euro after UK lawmakers on Tuesday rejected

the government's proposed timetable for passing legislation to

ratify its Brexit deal.

Against the dollar, the pound was last down 0.40% to

$1.281, off the 5-1/2 month highs hit earlier in the session on

optimism about the deal. Against the euro, the pound EURGBP=

was last down 0.24%, to 0.862.

The vote leaves Prime Minister Boris Johnson's vow to leave

the European Union by the end of the month in doubt.



Pound falls against dollar, euro after UK lawmakers reject Brexit timetable
description: Pound falls against dollar, euro after UK lawmakers reject Brexit timetable
